info.description:
This is a collection of Profit Center Details

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/organization`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Profit Center Details

get.summary: Returns a collection of Profit Center Core Attributes for One Profit Center

200.description: Collection of Profit Center Core Attributes

get.summary: Returns a collection of Profit Center Core Attributes

200.description: Collection of Profit Center Core Attributes

get.summary: Returns a collection of Profit Center Address Attributes

200.description: Collection of Profit Center Address Attributes

get.summary: Returns a collection of Profit Center Address Attributes

200.description: Collection of Profit Center Core Attributes

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

orgValueParam.name: org_value
orgValueParam.description: provide business organization code in URL to filter data set

formatParam.name: format
formatParam.description: allows to change the output to a desired format. 'JSON' - JSON, 'CSV' - CSV, 'XLS' - Excel

addressTypeParam.name: address_type
addressTypeParam.description: optional parameter to limit results to a specfic address type

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment. Only applicable in QA.

status.description: Indicator if the Profit Center is Active or not

status_description.description: Description of whether the Profit Center is Active or not

country.description: Country where the Profit Center operates

public_name.description: Public name of the Profit Center

legacy_value.description: Legacy CSP value of the Profit Center

open_date.description: Date on which the Profit Center opened

on_site_date.description: Date on which Aramark was on site for the Profit Center

operational_close_date.description: Date on which operations closed for the Profit Center

close_date.description: Date on which the Profit Center closed

line_of_service_code.description: Code for the line of service of the Profit Center

line_of_service.description: Description of the line of service of the Profit Center

default_service_type_code.description: Code for default service type of the Profit Center

default_service_type.description: Description of the default service type of the Profit Center

contract_type_code.description: Code for the contract type of the Profit Center

contract_type.description: Description of the contract type of the Profit Center

org_address_status.description: Indicator if the Profit Center Address is Active or not

address_type.description: Description of the Type of Address of the Profit Center

attn_line.description: Attention Line of the Address of the Profit Center

address_line_1.description: First Address line of the Profit Center

address_line_2.description: Second Address line of the Profit Center

address_line_3.description: Third Address line of the Profit Center

address_line_4.description: Fourth Address line of the Profit Center

address_line_5.description: Fifth Address line of the Profit Center

city_locality.description: City or Locality of the Profit Center

state_province.description: Sate or Province of the Profit Center

postal_code.description: Postal Code of the Profit Center

country_code.description: Code of the Country of the Profit Center

longitude.description: Longitude value of the Profit Center

latitude.description: Latitude value of the Profit Center

source.description: Source system for the Address Longitude and Latitude

formatted_address.description: Fully formatted Address of the Profit Center

is_validated.description: Indicator if the Profit Center Address has been validated or not

postal_town.description: Postal Town of the Profit Center

admin_area_level_3.description: Admin Area Level 3 description of the Profit Center
